author: crogers
msg: Fix for BEEHIVE-1166. Modified the DivPanel JavaScript support to use lookupIdScope() rather than the old getScopeId. Tested this client side JavaScript change manually using some of the existing DivPanel page flows in the NetUI coreWeb web app. Also fixed a comment in a test file.
Tests: NetUI BVT (WinXP pass) and manual test of DivPanel JavaScript support.

author: ddewolf
msg: Fixing easymock test for container factory

author: mbaessler
msg: rewrite JUnitExtension.getFile() method to load files using the classloader.
When changing this method I also deleted the TestPropertyReader class which is now never used.
With these two changes above, there where lots of tests that must also be changed and adapted
